title: Register
p-1: Register so you can securely sign in whenever you use this service.
p-3: You will also need information from 2 sources so we can check we are dealing with the right person. These are:
li-6: information about tax credits, if you claim them
p-4: Your information will be checked against our records. This also helps protect you from fraud.
p-5: We will send security codes to your email and mobile phone to check that they belong to you.
p-6: Whenever you sign in we will send a new security code to your mobile phone.
p-7: You will also need to create a password.
